descriptionHtml:
Ever wanted to spawn as many skeleton archers or warriors as your heart desired? nows your chance! 

Personally customized summonable otherworldy followers! 

Ever wanted a super cool Necromancer Lair in the side of a mountain? oddly enough nows also your chance for that! 

ALSO  ON WORKSHOP: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=353949720

this is just a beta so far, i will be adding many more summonable undead creatures, this mod adds a new Race you can start with called Necromancer and he has the special race ability to spawn as many creatures as he would like, though his health and stamina are low, his magika is set a little higher. 

If you do not want to start a new race or game, then make sure you search the bag next to the dead necromancer as you will see once fast travelling to "necromancers pass" near pelgia farm 

be sure to check the Table next to your bed in your lair for the book for news on upcoming updates! 

COMPATABLE WITH MOST MODS 
I have a nvidia gtx 750 graphics card 
8 core 3.6ghz 
1tb hard drive 
8gb ram 
I could spawn about 400 of them before i started to drop fps 
On ultra settings
author: Coley Diesel
